TEXT: e1: It is quite clear that Sunday should remain a day of rest.
CN RELATION: Sunday, remain a day of rest (CapableOf)/Sunday, day of rest (IsA)/Sunday, rest (UsedFor)

TEXT: e2: For you can go shopping 6 days a week,
CN RELATION: 6 days a week, shopping (UsedFor)/shopping, 6 days a week (AtLocation)/you, go shopping 6 days a week (CapableOf)

TEXT: e3: as shops are open till 10pm on some days.
CN RELATION: shops, open till 10pm on some days (HasProperty)

TEXT: e4: Thus Sundays should remain a day for getting together with family,
CN RELATION: Sunday, remain a day for getting together with family (CapableOf)/Sunday, day for getting together with family (IsA)/Sunday, getting together with family (UsedFor)

TEXT: e5: otherwise there will be a new kind of leisure activity where people spend their time in supermarkets instead of outside or in conversation etc.
CN RELATION: leisure activity, new (HasProperty)/people, spend time in supermarkets (CapableOf)/people, supermarkets (AtLocation)/people, outside (AtLocation)/people, spend time outside (CapableOf)/people, spending time in conversation (CapableOf)/spending time in supermarkets, leisure activity (IsA)/spending time outside, leisure activity (IsA)/spending time in conversation, leisure activity (IsA)/supermarkets, spending time (UsedFor)/outside, spending time (UsedFor)/conversation, spending time (UsedFor)/time, conversation (UsedFor)

TEXT: e6: Furthermore, there's no need to keep shops open on Sundays.
